Camden.Adath Shalom (Philadelphia):
Adath Shalom Syagogue was located in the Whitman neighborhood of South Philadelphia.
Adath Shalom formed in 1950 as a Conservative synagogue when Shaare Israel, B’nai Moshe, and Beth Samuel merged and formed in Beth Samuel’s building. Beth Samuel was referred to as Beys Shmuel, or the litvishe shul.
